mapper.select: SELECT count(CASE WHEN item_stat = 1 THEN 1 END) as st1Total, count(CASE WHEN item_stat = 5 THEN 1 END) as st5Total, count(CASE WHEN item_stat = 6 THEN 1 END) as st6Total FROM order_item
mapper.update: update order_item set item_delv=#{item_delv}, item_trk_num=#{item_trk_num}, item_stat=1 where item_no=#{item_no}

UPDATE order_item oi SET item_stat = CASE WHEN item_stat = 1 AND ( SELECT o.ord_date FROM "order" o WHERE o.ord_no = oi.ord_no ) <= SYSDATE - (1/24) THEN 2 WHEN item_stat = 2 AND ( SELECT o.ord_date FROM "order" o WHERE o.ord_no = oi.ord_no ) <= SYSDATE - (2/24) THEN 2 THEN 3 ELSE item_stat END
